statements: SELECT * FROM user_queries;
SELECT query_text, query_timestamp FROM user_queries WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT query_text, query_timestamp FROM user_queries WHERE query_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_queries GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT query_id, user_id, query_text, query_timestamp FROM user_queries ORDER BY query_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, query_text FROM user_queries WHERE query_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, query_text FROM user_queries WHERE query_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT query_id, user_id, query_text, query_timestamp FROM user_queries ORDER BY query_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(query_id) AS total_queries FROM user_queries GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_queries > 5;
SELECT user_id, query_text FROM user_queries WHERE query_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND query_timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM user_queries;
SELECT query_id, user_id, query_text FROM user_queries WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT query_text, query_date FROM user_queries WHERE query_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY query_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_requests WHERE request_id = 5;
SELECT request_id, request_text FROM support_requests WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY request_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_queries WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY query_date DESC;
SELECT query_id, query_text FROM user_queries WHERE query_text LIKE '%important%' AND query_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM support_requests WHERE request_status = 'open';
SELECT request_id, request_text FROM support_requests WHERE user_id = 3 AND request_status IN ('pending', 'in progress') ORDER BY request_id;
SELECT * FROM user_queries uq JOIN support_requests sr ON uq.user_id = sr.user_id WHERE uq.user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_queries;
SELECT query_id, user_id, query_text FROM user_queries ORDER BY query_timestamp DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, user_id, ticket_status FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status='Open';
SELECT resolution_id, ticket_id, resolution_text FROM query_resolution WHERE resolution_timestamp >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT ticket_id, user_id, ticket_description FROM support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_queries WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT query_id, query_text FROM user_queries WHERE query_timestamp > '2021-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY query_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open' AND ticket_timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY ticket_timestamp

SELECT t.ticket_id, tr.resolution_text, t.ticket_timestamp FROM support_tickets t JOIN query_resolution tr ON t.ticket_id = tr.ticket_id INNER JOIN user_queries u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.query_id = '423e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY t.ticket_timestamp
SELECT s.ticket_id, s.ticket_description, r.resolution_text FROM support_tickets s LEFT JOIN query_resolution r ON s.ticket_id = r.ticket_id WHERE r.resolution_timestamp IS NULL
SELECT * FROM UserQueries ORDER BY query_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, query_text FROM UserQueries WHERE query_id = 3;
SELECT request_text, request_timestamp FROM SupportRequests WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM QueryResolution WHERE resolution_id = 5;
SELECT support_id, support_text, support_timestamp FROM CustomerSupport ORDER BY support_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserQueries WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY query_timestamp DESC;
SELECT request_id, request_text FROM SupportRequests WHERE request_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY request_timestamp ASC;
SELECT query_text, resolution_text FROM UserQueries JOIN QueryResolution ON UserQueries.query_id = QueryResolution.query_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_queries FROM UserQueries GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_queries > 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupport WHERE support_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM UserQueries WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT query, timestamp FROM UserQueries WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM UserQueries WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, query FROM UserQueries WHERE timestamp < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM UserQueries WHERE query LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT query, timestamp, user_id FROM UserQueries WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM UserQueries WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT query FROM UserQueries WHERE query LIKE '%search%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS query_count FROM UserQueries GROUP BY user_id HAVING query_count > 5 ORDER BY query_count DESC
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM UserQueries GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY latest_timestamp
